name: Connect Quest
description:
Connect Quest is a game about building your deck of tokens to defeat your foes.  The gameplay takes connect four and turns it into a strategic rougelite. Find Unique tokens and items to aid you in your journey.

Current version Features:

- 11 tokens

- 8 items

- 5 enemies

- 1 Boss

PLEASE NOTE THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT.
